dynamic: Generosity meets nurturing; risk of over-giving time or money.
healthyBoundary: Set weekly budget for shared activities, schedule personal learning hours, agree on check-ins before lending resources.

dynamic: Creator inspires leader, but can trigger criticism cycles.
healthyBoundary: Use retrospective meetings instead of real-time critiques, document decisions in shared notes, rotate facilitation duties.

dynamic: Intuition supports bold moves; emotional volatility possible.
healthyBoundary: Establish 24-hour pause before major commitments, practice somatic grounding, define non-negotiable self-care windows.

dynamic: Friends-to-partners or co-founders; financial entanglement risks.
healthyBoundary: Create separate accounts/contracts, review revenue splits quarterly, celebrate wins without tying self-worth to profit.

dynamic: Voice meets authority; perpetual debate possible.
healthyBoundary: Adopt 'ask vs. tell' code words, plan weekly date/relax time without agendas, alternate decision ownership per project.

dynamic: Nurturer builds prosperity but can overextend.
healthyBoundary: Batch client delivery, institute office hours for support, build savings automation to reduce stress.
